column2: ${username}! Doth thy day continue to shine with mirth and glee? Until we meet again

column3: thou bringest a smile to mine visage. Let us keep the positive vibes flowing like a merry brook. Farewell for now!

column2: dear ${username}! Let us take a moment to celebrate the wondrous things that unfold around us. Until we meet again

column3: like a duet of joyous melodies. Fare thee well
thy resilience is an inspiration. Alloweth my words to be a gentle reminder
column4: that we may stay connected and strong. Fare thee well!
